Class Raytracer 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----Algorithm
           |
           +----Raytracer
public class Raytracer
extends Algorithm
Raytracer.java an implementation of a raytracer includes methods to: render a scene, record an animation of a rendering, draw frames of an animation.

Version:
99.3.1
Author:
Brian Maltzan

Raytracer(Sim)

draw_frame(AlgFrame)
draw one frame of the recording.
execute()
calls the algorithm to demonstrate it's execution without any simulation recording.
get_relative_view_pt()
get current view point (camera location) minus the look-at-point.
get_scene(RaytracerSetupButtons)
send current object data to setup card panel.
get_view_d()
get current viewing 'd' (rho,phi,theta,d)
get_view_d2()
trial-n-error: get current viewing 'd' (rho,phi,theta,d)
get_view_pt()
get current view point (camera location).
get_view_pt2()
trial-n-error: get current viewing 'd' (rho,phi,theta,d)
Raytracer2()
record(Point)
record a sequence from the algorithm to allow forward, reverse, and steping.
record_scene(Point)
record the setup section of an algorithm.
scene1()
scene2()
set_lights(TLight[], int)
store light additions from the setup panel.
set_objects(DisplayFrameElement[], TColor[], TColor[], TColor[], T3d[], int)
set_view(RaytracerDFEView)
store view camera data from the setup panel.
trace(int, int)
trace2(int, int)
viewing2()

get_scene 
 public void get_scene(RaytracerSetupButtons r)
send current object data to setup card panel. send light points to rtsb. send viewing data.

Parameters:
r - object to use to send scene data back.
get_view_pt 
 public T3d get_view_pt()
get current view point (camera location).

get_relative_view_pt 
 public T3d get_relative_view_pt()
get current view point (camera location) minus the look-at-point.

 public void set_lights(TLight l[],

set_view 
 public void set_view(RaytracerDFEView v)
store view camera data from the setup panel.

Parameters:
v - holds camera location.
